item.title: Completionist's Cape stand wont give cape
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_ur_mom k0ed ur mom
item.description:
@k0ed_ur_mom wrote:

[quote=“VorargC, post:9, topic:480105”] else if (id == 2562) { if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.ATTACK) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.STRENGTH) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.DEFENCE) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RANGE) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.PRAYER) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.MAGIC) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RUNECRAFTING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.CONSTRUCTION) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HITPOINTS) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.AGILITY) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HERBLORE) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.THIEVING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.CRAFTING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SLAYER) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HUNTER) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.MINING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SMITHING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FISHING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.COOKING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FIREMAKING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.WOODCUTTING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FARMING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SUMMONING) == 99 && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.DUNGEONEERING) == 120){ player.getInventory().addItem(20769, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(20770, 1); } else { send message that they don't have the skills return; } }

Ugly but should work[/quote]

dude! i love you! no homo. but this works amazing!!

item.title: Completionist's Cape stand wont give cape
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

 else if (id == 2562) {
   if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.ATTACK) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.STRENGTH) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.DEFENCE) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RANGE) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.PRAYER) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.MAGIC) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RUNECRAFTING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.CONSTRUCTION) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HITPOINTS) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.AGILITY) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HERBLORE) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.THIEVING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.CRAFTING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SLAYER) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HUNTER) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.MINING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SMITHING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FISHING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.COOKING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FIREMAKING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.WOODCUTTING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FARMING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SUMMONING) == 99
   && player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.DUNGEONEERING) == 120){
		player.getInventory().addItem(20769, 1);
		player.getInventory().addItem(20770, 1);
   } else {
		send message that they don't have the skills
		return;
   }		
}

Ugly but should work

item.title: Completionist's Cape stand wont give cape
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_ur_mom k0ed ur mom
item.description:
@k0ed_ur_mom wrote:

ok so i coded where if you dont have the skill reqs, it doesnt give you anything. but when i try to make it where you have the skills, it gives the cape, it doesnt give anything heres my code

			else if (id == 2562) {
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.ATTACK) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.STRENGTH) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.DEFENCE) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RANGE) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.PRAYER) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.MAGIC) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.RUNECRAFTING) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.CONSTRUCTION) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HITPOINTS) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.AGILITY) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HERBLORE) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.THIEVING) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.CRAFTING) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FLETCHING) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SLAYER) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.HUNTER) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.MINING) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SMITHING) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FISHING) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.COOKING) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FIREMAKING) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.WOODCUTTING) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FARMING) == 99) 
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.SUMMONING) == 99)
				if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.DUNGEONEERING) == 120) 
				return;
idk what to do here	-->	player.getInventory().addItem(20769, 1);
					player.getInventory().addItem(20770, 1);
			}
